more_info.origin: Obtained from ammonia and ph osphorylated fatty acids, mainly from rapeseed oil.
more_info.products: Only used in chocolate and cocoa products
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods
more_info.dietary_restrictions: E442 is generally produced with rapeseed oil and can thus be consumed by all religious groups. However, the use of animal fat (incl. pork) can not be completed excluded.
